description:
Located just 2 km from the famous Mont Saint-Michel, Gites Bellevue offers self-catering cottages with a terrace, garden and BBQ facilities. The sea is only a 10-minute drive away.

The cottages feature views of the Mont Saint-Michel, a living area with a TV and a washing machine. The kitchen includes an oven, stove and microwave.

Grocery shops and restaurants can be found 7 km away in the centre of Pontorson and both free Wi-Fi access and free private parking are available. Saint-Malo is a 45-minute drive away and Avranches is 25 km from the property.

Set in Saint Malo, just 400 metres from Mole Beach, Le Pilo offers beachfront accommodation with free WiFi. The property features city views and is 500 metres from Eventail Beach and 400 metres from Grand Bé. The property is 300 metres from Bon Secours Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The 2-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palais du Grand Large, Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and National Fort.

hotel_name: Hotel Le Lion D'Or et Restaurant La Table Du Lion
description:
This former 18th-century post office is now a charming hotel located in one of Bayeux’s oldest quarters. It offers 24-hour reception and is just 400 metres from the Bayeux Tapestry Museum.

Free Wi-Fi access is provided in each soundproofed room. All rooms are light and spacious and have their own bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning. The hotel’s restaurant serves creative French cuisine. After dinner, guests can relax with a drink of Calvados and listen to some music by the fireplace in the lounge bar.

The staff at Le Lion D’or can help arrange local excursions through their concierge service. Massage treatments can be arranged near the property upon request.

hotel_name: JOST Hostel Le Havre Centre Gare
description:
JOST Hostel Le Havre Centre Gare features a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Le Havre. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.3 km from Le Havre Beach.

All units in the hostel are equipped with a coffee machine. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Breakfast is available, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options.

You can play darts at JOST Hostel Le Havre Centre Gare.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Saint-Michel's Church, Le Volcan and Perret Model Appartment.

Appart Rouen Centre offers accommodation within 800 metres of the centre of Rouen, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is set less than 1 km from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen and provides luggage storage space. Gare de Rouen Rive Droite is less than 1 km away and Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall is 2.8 km from the apartment.

At the apartment complex, each unit comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Kitchenware is also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Voltaire Station, Rouen is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen is 4.5 km away. Deauville - Normandie Airport is 85 km from the property.

hotel_name: Spacieux appartement à 50m du Sacre Coeur - Magnifique Vue
description:
In the 18th arr. District of Paris, close to Sacré-Coeur, Spacieux appartement à 50m du Sacre Coeur - Magnifique Vue features free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is around 3.5 km from Gare Saint-Lazare, 2 km from Gare de l'Est and 4.1 km from Opéra Garnier. Musée de l'Orangerie is 4.6 km from the apartment and Louvre Museum is 5.3 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Cigale Concert Hall, Pigalle Metro Station and Gare du Nord. Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport is 21 km away.

Set in Amiens in the Picardy region, with Amiens Train Station and The Floating gardens Park nearby, LA BERGE offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around less than 1 km from Berny's Museum, a 12-minute walk from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens and 5.2 km from University of Picardie Jules Verne. The property is non-smoking and is located 4.5 km from Zénith d'Amiens.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and toaster, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Amiens Golf Club is 7.1 km from the apartment, while French-Australian Museum is 23 km away. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 66 km from the property.

Hotel Kanaï is located in the centre of Lille, in a pedestrianised area, only 200 metres from the famous Grand Place, a 15-minute walk from Lille Grand Palais and a 6-minute walk from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre.

All rooms feature flat-screen satellite TV and modern furnishings.

A breakfast is available daily and is composed of produce from local farms.

Shops, restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance.

The friendly and attentive staff at the Hotel Kanaï will be happy to help you organise your stay in Lille 24 hours a day. Lille-Europe TGV Train Station is 1 km away and Lille Flandres Train Station is 550 metres from the property.

hotel_name: Résidence le premium, hyper centre, studio tout équipé
description:
Offering city views, Résidence le premium, hyper centre, studio tout équipé is an accommodation situated in Strasbourg, 1.2 km from The 'Petite France' and 1.7 km from Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 1.2 km from St. Paul's Church.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a satellite flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

There is a coffee shop, and a grocery delivery service and a minimarket are also available.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Strasbourg Cathedral is less than 1 km from Résidence le premium, hyper centre, studio tout équipé, while Strasbourg Exhibition Centre is 2.4 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 11 km away.

Offering a garden and garden view, LA MAISON EN PAIN D'EPICES is situated in Sainte-Marie-aux-Mines, 38 km from Colmar Expo and 41 km from House of the Heads. The property is around 41 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church, 45 km from Colmar Train Station and 48 km from Würth Museum. The property is non-smoking and is set 19 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

The holiday home is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. Offering free private parking, this 3-star holiday home also features free WiFi. The property has an outdoor dining area.

The holiday home has a children's playground and a barbecue.

Gérardmer Lake is 49 km from LA MAISON EN PAIN D'EPICES, while Cigoland is 22 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 60 km away.

Situated in Colmar, 1.1 km from Colmar Train Station, Novotel Suites Colmar Centre features accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a terrace and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from House of the Heads.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Novotel Suites Colmar Centre rooms come with a seating area.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Guests staying at Novotel Suites Colmar Centre have access to the in-house wellness area which includes a sauna and a hammam.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 700 metres from the hotel, while Colmar Expo is 4.1 km from the property. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 55 km away.

hotel_name: BREDALA**** Gîte maison Alsacienne avec Jardin
description:
Situated in Eguisheim, 5.9 km from Colmar Train Station and 6.8 km from House of the Heads, BREDALA**** Gîte maison Alsacienne avec Jardin offers a garden and air conditioning. Featuring mountain and garden views, this apartment also includes free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 7.2 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

This apartment features 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a bath. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Barbecue facilities are provided.

Colmar Expo is 10 km from the apartment, while Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 35 km from the property. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport, 54 km from BREDALA**** Gîte maison Alsacienne avec Jardin.

hotel_name: Chambre d'hôte chez l'habitant, avec parking gratuit
description:
Featuring inner courtyard views, Chambre d'hôte chez l'habitant, avec parking gratuit offers accommodation with a shared lounge and a balcony, around 1.1 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station. This property offers access to a terrace and free private parking. The accommodation features a lift, a shared kitchen and luggage storage for guests.

With free WiFi, this homestay provides a satellite flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured in the homestay. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a shared bathroom.

À la carte and continental breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and pancakes are available. There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the homestay will be able to enjoy activities in and around Besançon, like walking tours.

Besançon-Mouillère train station is 1.4 km from Chambre d'hôte chez l'habitant, avec parking gratuit, while Micropolis is 5.9 km away. Dole-Jura Airport is 63 km from the property.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Dijon Toison D'or by IHG
description:
Offering a spa with sauna, hammam and fitness centre, the Holiday Inn is located just outside Dijon’s historic city centre, in the heart of the Toison d’Or Technological Park. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi access.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided in each spacious room. The rooms have a contemporary décor with colour accents. Private bathrooms feature Starck bathroom fixtures.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and the restaurant, Gallery 412, serves traditional and modern French cuisine. The on-site bar, Light Bar, serves a large selection of wines.

Holiday Inn Dijon is a 15-minute tramway ride from the Dijon Train Station and a 5-minute walk from Zenith de Dijon. Free parking is available on site and the hotel is a 2-minute drive from the highway. With 180 shops, The Centre La Toison d'Or shopping centre is a 1-minute walk away.

Set just off the banks of Lake Annecy, this hotel is 1.5 km from the centre of town.

The rooms at Hôtel Catalpa include an LCD TV with satellite channels. They also provide free toiletries in the en-suite bathroom.

You can enjoy the continental breakfast in your guest room or in the hotel’s dining room.

You can also park your car in the hotel’s private parking with an extra cost and upon prior reservation.

Annecy Casino is 300 meters away, and a public beach is 300 metres away from the property.

A traditional restaurant is available for lunch and dinner on Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturday and Sundays for lunch only

This B&B hotel is located in Grenoble, just 800 metres from Alpexpo. With a 24-hour reception, it offers a free Wi-Fi connection and soundproofed accommodation. It is 200 metres from Grand Place Tram Station.

All of the rooms at B&B Grenoble Centre Alpexpo are serviced by a lift and are decorated in a contemporary style. Each room features a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the communal lounge.

Luggage storage is provided at B&B Grenoble Centre Alpexpo. There are limited parking places available free of charge, and the Bastille is 7 km away. There is access to A480 motorway, 5 km away.

Citadines Presqu'île Lyon is located in the centre of Lyon, between the Rhône and Saône Rivers in the heart of the Presqu'île district. It offers fully equipped studios and apartments with free WiFi access.

Each apartment and studio at Citadines Presqu'île Lyon has a safety deposit box, ironing facilities and satellite TV. The kitchenette has a fridge, microwave, dishwasher and toaster. Bed linen and towels are provided. Some units have air conditioning.

For an additional cost, a buffet breakfast is available daily in the breakfast room. The reception desk is open 24 hours a day. There is a launderette on site offering a dry-cleaning service at a supplement.

Citadines Presqu'île Lyon is located 450 metres from Cordeliers Bourse Metro Station. Vieux Lyon is a 6-minute walk away, while Place Bellecour is 500 metres from the property. Lyon-Perrache Train Station is a 13-minute drive away. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge and is subject to availability.

hotel_name: Vieux Lyon avec vue sur la Saône AIL
description:
Situated right in the centre of Lyon, Vieux Lyon avec vue sur la Saône AIL provides accommodation with river views, just 1.2 km from Fourviere Roman Theatre and 1.2 km from Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere. The property is located 700 metres from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, 800 metres from Musée Miniature et Cinéma and 3.1 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station. The property features a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Part-Dieu Train Station is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Musée des Confluences is 6.2 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 31 km away.

Hotelo Lyon Ainay offers affordable accommodation near the city centre and old town. It is a 5-minute walk from the Lyon Perrache railway station and free WiFi is available.

Rooms at the Hotelo Lyon Ainay are spacious and soundproofed. They are all equipped with en suite facilities and satellite TV. Some of the rooms are air-conditioned.

Hotelo Lyon Ainay  is conveniently located near public transport and shops, making it an ideal base for exploring Lyon. Paid underground public parking is available in front of the property.

Please note that for reservations of 5 rooms or more different cancellation conditions apply.

hotel_name: mmm - 25BA - Suites de Luxe - Centre de Lyon
description:
Ideally situated in the centre of Lyon, mmm - 25BA - Suites de Luxe - Centre de Lyon features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and free private parking. It is situated 400 metres from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

At the apartment complex, units include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. There is also a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a microwave and kitchenware. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Musée Miniature et Cinéma, Fourviere Roman Theatre and Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 31 km from the property.

Situated in Lyon, 2.5 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma and 3 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, DIFY Universités - Bord du Rhône offers air conditioning. The 4-star apartment is 3.1 km from Part-Dieu Train Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Lyon Perrache Train Station is 1 km away.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Fourviere Roman Theatre is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Musée des Confluences is 4 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 26 km away.

Bayard Bellecour, an authentic historical house in the heart of the town. Enjoy all the modern comforts in a traditionally decorated building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

Rooms at Bayard Bellecour have either flat-screen TV or free digital tablets. All room are air-conditioned. The private bathroom provides a hairdryer. The reception on the 1st floor and rooms on the 1st and 2nd floor are not serviced by lift. They are only accessible via a staircase

A buffet breakfast with cold and hot dishes is served every morning in the breakfast room. The buffet breakfast is made with local products and homemade food.

The Basilica of Notre Dame de Fourvière is 2 km from the property, while the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is a 17-minute walk away. Bayard Bellecour is 300 metres from Bellecour Metro Station and a 7-minute drive from Lyon Perrache Train Station.

"Set in a historical building, with original features, Hôtel Silky by HappyCulture offers accommodation with free WiFi in the Lyon. It is located a 7-minute walk away from Place des Terreaux and Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service.

Guest rooms at Hôtel Silky by HappyCulture are decorated in a classic style. They are equipped with a private bathroom and flat-screen TV. A safe and ironing facilities are available for free if you request them in advance.

Every morning a Buffet breakfast is available. For lunch and dinner, guests have a wide choice of cafes and restaurants nearby.

Cordeliers metro station is a 2-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Lyon Saint Exupery, 30 km away. Public parking is available at a location nearby the hotel."

Located in the centre of Lyon, 140 metres from Place des Jacobins and 400 metres from Place Bellecour, Best Western Lyon Saint-Antoine offers accommodation with free WiFi. The hotel reception is run by multilingual staff and is open 24-hours a day.

All rooms feature a safe, a desk and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room has its own private bathroom with a hair dryer. Guests will also find a welcome tray in each of the rooms.

A breakfast buffet can be enjoyed daily either in the dinning area or in your room. Breakfast includes a selection of fresh, local products including organic and gluten free options. An express take-away breakfast is also available upon request.

Best Western Lyon Saint-Antoine is just 500 metres from the Bellecour Metro station, making it easy to explore the city. The nearest public parking, parking des Célestins, is available within a 5-minute walk, at an extra charge.

 Please note that there is no A/C in the appartment.

 Please note that the hotel is 100% NON-smoking. Any triggering of the fire alarme due to cigarette smoke is liable to a penalty of 190€.

 Please note that a pre-authorization can be made to guarantee your stay. Also, the payment can be asked at arrival.

Please note that the elevator stops at the middle floor. There are a few steps to access the rooms. The staff is at your disposal for any help.

hotel_name: Best Western Hotel du Pont Wilson
description:
Located in Lyon city centre, Best Western Hotel du Pont Wilson offers modern rooms and suites with a view of the Fourvière hill in the historic part of the city. Free WiFi is provided.

All guest rooms at Hotel du Pont Wilson are stylishly decorated, each with a different colour scheme. Rooms are equipped with satellite TV, and are serviced by a lift. Each of the white-tiled private bathrooms includes a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the guest's breakfast area or can be served in the privacy of the guest rooms for an extra charge. Express and take-away breakfast options including a hot beverage, a piece of fresh fruit, a dairy product, orange juice and pastries are available.

Hotel du Pont Wilson is situated opposite the Presqu’ile, where guests can visit the Musee des Beaux Arts. It is just 50 metres from the Liberté Tram Stop, and is a 15-minute walk from Part-Dieu Train Station.

Located in central Lyon, in a 19th century building, this Mercure hotel is a 8-minute walk from Lyon old town and a 5-minute walk from Bellecour Square. The hotel offers air-conditioned, art deco style rooms with free WiFi.

Guest rooms at the Mercure Lyon Beaux-Arts are equipped with a satellite flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each room has an en suite bathroom with a bathtub or walk-in shower, and all rooms are serviced by a lift.

Breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room or in guests’ rooms upon request. There is also an express breakfast consisting of a hot drink, fresh juice, bread, a pastry and jam available at the bar.

The reception desk at the Mercure Lyon Beaux-Arts is staffed 24 hours a day. Additional facilities available at the hotel include free newspapers, luggage storage and meeting rooms. Many shops and restaurants are located nearby.

Bellecour Metro Station is located 300 metres from the hotel. Public parking is available 200 metres away for an extra charge.

Located opposite Lyon-Perrache TGV Train Station, Mercure Lyon Centre Château Perrache is a 4-star hotel set in a listed Art Nouveau building, on Lyon Presqu'ile. With free WiFi throughout, it offers a restaurant with a terrace.

All rooms at the property feature a 47 inch flat-screen TV with international channels and a Bluetooth sound system and are fitted with a private bathroom. A Nespresso coffee machine, free soft drinks in the minibar and bathrobes are available in the Privilege rooms.

A hot and cold breakfast buffet with local produce is available daily. It can be served in guestrooms for an extra charge. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour reception and luggage storage facilities.

Perrache underground station, tram and bus stops are located within 200 metres. Place Bellecour is a 15-minute walk from Mercure Lyon Centre Château Perrache, while Musée des Confluences is 2 km or 3 tram stops away. Lyon-Saint Exupéry Airport is 37 km away.

Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture is located in central Lyon, a 5-minute walk from the Lyon Perrache TGV and Metro stations. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access.

Each room at the Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture is equipped with satellite TV and en suite facilities. Some rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast buffet is available daily and the Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture’s restaurant, La Bibliothèque, serves regional cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Le Mélèze bar, which features an outdoor floral terrace.

Place Bellecour is a 20-minute walk from the hotel, and the Notre Dame de Fourvière Basilica is 2 km away. The Suchet tram stop is just 120 metres from the hotel.

Boasting a fitness centre, a terrace as well as a restaurant, Keystone Hôtel & Spa is set in the centre of Lyon, less than 1 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has a hot tub and a concierge service.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options.

Keystone Hôtel & Spa offers a spa centre.

Musée des Confluences is 1.3 km from the accommodation, while Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 2.9 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 28 km away.

Artelier 32 - Lyon Tête d'Or is situated in the 6th arr. District of Lyon, 3.6 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma, 3.7 km from Fourviere Roman Theatre and 4 km from Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 1.5 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon. The property is non-smoking and is located 2 km from Part-Dieu Train Station.

This apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Lyon Perrache Train Station is 4.7 km from the apartment, while Musée des Confluences is 6.5 km away. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 33 km from the property.

Located on Lyon Presqu'ile, in the city centre, ibis Lyon Centre Perrache is a hotel set in an art-deco style building. It is located a 5-minute walk from Place Bellecour and boasts an onsite bar. Free WiFi access is provided.

The rooms at ibis Lyon Centre Perrache are air-conditioned and include an LCD TV with satellite channels.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

The bar is available 24 hours a day and offers take-away meals to be eaten in the comfort of your room.

The 24-hour reception hotel includes other facilities such as a safety deposit box. Perrache train station, bus and tram stops are located a 2-minute walk away. Public parking is available 300 metres away.

Located on Lyon Presqu’île, a 10-minute walk from Vieux Lyon, Mercure Lyon Centre Plaza République offers free WiFi throughout the property.

All guest rooms have air conditioning, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The private bathroom provides a hairdryer. Each room comes with a bottle of water, free toiletries and an international plug socket.

Buffet breakfast and express breakfast options are available daily at a supplement. In the evening, guests may relax in the hotel’s Plaza Bar. The reception desk is open 24 hours a day and free newspapers are offered in the lobby.

Mercure Lyon Centre Plaza République is 500 metres from Cordeliers Metro Station, while Place Bellecour is a 7-minute walk away. Lyon-Perrache Train Station is 13 minutes away by car.

hotel_name: Hotel De Verdun 1882, BW Signature Collection
description:
Hotel De Verdun 1882, BW Signature Collection is located in central Lyon on the Presqu’Ile, 450 metres from the Lyon Perrache TGV Train Station. It offers en suite rooms with satellite TV and high-speed WiFi.

Set within a former private mansion dating from 1882, Hotel De Verdun 1882 provides a daily buffet breakfast.

Hotel De Verdun 1882 has a 24-hour front desk and security guard.

Guests have easy access to the city’s many shops and restaurants. Place Bellecour is a 10 minute walk away and Vieux Lyon is 1.5 km from the hotel.

hotel_name: Opera 6 - Lovely studio - Hôtel de Ville
description:
Located in the centre of Lyon, just 300 metres from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon and 1.3 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma, Opera 6 - Lovely studio - Hôtel de Ville provides accommodation with city views and free WiFi. The property is around 1.8 km from Fourviere Roman Theatre, 1.7 km from Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere and 3.5 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.4 km from Part-Dieu Train Station.

The apartment is fitted with a TV. The kitchenette is equipped with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge, as well as coffee machine and kettle. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Musée des Confluences is 5.3 km from the apartment, while Eurexpo is 16 km away. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 35 km from the property.

hotel_name: Hôtel Vaubecour - Centre Lyon Ainay - Perrache
description:
Hôtel Vaubecour - Centre Lyon Ainay - Perrache is located in Lyon, on the 2nd floor of a building. Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts is 1.6 km away and Lyon Perrache Train Station is 500 metres from the hotel. Free WiFi access is available.

Accessed via a lift, the non-smoking guest rooms feature a desk and a TV with satellite channels. The private bathrooms have a shower. Hôtel Vaubecour - Centre Lyon Ainay - Perrache offers a free daily cleaning service for your convenience.

Please note that the property does not have air conditioning.

Breakfast is available, which can be enjoyed in the breakfast room. A library and board games are at guests' disposal.

The hotel is 2.4 km from La Part-Dieu Business District. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 20 km away.

Please note that the elevator is not accessible to people with reduced mobility.

Le 14 Sathonay in Lyon features accommodation with free WiFi, a 5-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, 400 metres from Place des Terreaux and a 7-minute walk from Opera National de Lyon. The Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere is within 1.100 kilometres of the apartment.

The air-conditioned apartment features 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a bathroom. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is offered.

With staff speaking English and French, around the clock information is available at the reception.

The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 20 km from the property.

Located in the heart of Lyon, on the Presqu’île District, Republik Hotel offers accommodation with a 24-hour reception and free WiFi. Place Bellecour and Bellecour Metro Station are both 230 metres from the property.

Each air-conditioned room comes with a kettle, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and is fitted with a bath or a shower. A baby cot can be added to the room upon request and subject to prior approval from the hotel.

A breakfast buffet is served every morning, including bread, pastries, cereal, cold meat, cheese, jam, hot drinks and fruit juice. A range of amenities including shops, bars and restaurants are available within 200 metres of the property.

Saint-Jean-Baptiste Cathedral and Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts are both available within a 15-minute walk from Republik Hotel, while the Cordliers district is 600 metres away. Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station is 2.2 km away. Public parking is available a 2-minute walk away.

hotel_name: Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu
description:
Situated 3.5 km from Musée Miniature et Cinéma, Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu offers accommodation with a balcony. This 4-star aparthotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a lift. The property is fitted with an indoor pool and is set 500 metres from Part-Dieu Train Station. Facilities for disabled guests are also available.

At the aparthotel, the units include a desk and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the aparthotel also have free WiFi. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. There is a coffee shop and lounge.

If you would like to discover the area, walking tours is possible in the surroundings and Nemea Appart Hotel So Cloud Lyon Gare Part-Dieu can arrange a bicycle rental service.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 3.9 km from the accommodation, while Lyon Perrache Train Station is 4.7 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 28 km away.

Situated in Lyon and with Part-Dieu Train Station reachable within 200 metres, Pullman Lyon features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The units have a desk.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

hotel_name: Studio Le Cocon de Jacquard with Breakfast
description:

The property is set 200 metres from Musée Miniature et Cinéma, 2 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station and 3.2 km from Part-Dieu Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies.

A continental breakfast is available at the apartment.

Musée des Confluences is 6.1 km from Studio Le Cocon de Jacquard with Breakfast, while Eurexpo is 17 km away. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 32 km from the property.

Located 300 metres from Part-Dieu Train Station, the hotel features an on-site bar & restaurant with panoramic views of Lyon from the 32nd floor of the iconic Part Dieu Tower. It offers a fitness centre and free WiFi is available throughout the property. Private parking is available on site for an extra charge.

All rooms are air conditioned and provide panoramic views of Lyon. Equipped with a flat-screen TV, they feature a seating area, a private bathroom and a laptop safe.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Celest Bar & Restaurant. Guests can have lunch or dinner onsite and enjoy the restaurant international and creative cuisine. Guests can also access the restaurant's food shop throughout the day.

Part-Dieu shopping centre is 100 metres away and metro station is 200 metres away. A6, A7, A42 and A43 motorways are all within a 20-minute drive from the hotel. The nearest airport is Lyon – Saint Exupery Airport, 27 km form Radisson Blu Hotel Lyon.

Private parking is available on site for an extra charge and under availability.

Accessed by a lift, the spacious air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with satellite TV and a free minibar. Each room has a private bathroom stocked with free Clarins toiletries.

The hotel offers meals in its lounge bar or in the comfort of guest rooms, at certain times of the day.

Park Hôtel Grenoble - MGallery is a 5-minute walk from the Palais des Sports and a 10-minute tram ride from the Grenoble World Trade Centre.

A one-night parking space with discount rate is available just 150 metres away. Ski slopes and mountain hiking trails are just a 30-minute drive away.

hotel_name: Hôtel restaurant d'application Lesdiguieres - Ecole hôtelière -
description:

At the hotel, rooms have a desk. All rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. All guest rooms in Hôtel restaurant d'application Lesdiguieres - Ecole hôtelière - are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available at the accommodation.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Italian at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area.

Grenoble Train Station is 3 km from Hôtel restaurant d'application Lesdiguieres - Ecole hôtelière -, while WTC Grenoble is 5 km from the property. Alpes–Isère Airport is 48 km away.

Meal trays can be served for dinner, from 18:00 to 20:30.

This hotel also has luggage storage and private parking on site. The Modern Art Gallery is just 3 km away and the hotel is accessible via the A480 motorway, 1.3 km away. Free public parking is available nearby and paid secured parking is available at the hotel.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

A buffet breakfast is available every day and includes hot, cold, sweet and savoury options. An other continental breakfast option consisting of a hot drink, a juice, a pasty, bread, butter and jam is also available.

Located in the heart of Grenoble on a quiet street, only 450 metres from the SNCF train station and offers free WiFi, service clean, comfortable rooms with modern facilities and a friendly, relaxed atmosphere.

To get off to a good start you can enjoy your breakfast before heading out to experience the capital of the Franche-Comté region.

Several adjustable equipped meeting rooms are available onsite and can accommodate groups of up to 45 people.

Other onsite services available to guests aged 12 and above include a fitness room, a heated outdoor pool, a sauna, 2 hot tubs, a hammam, a sensorial shower and a relaxation room . Massages using Equatoria products.

Secure private parking is featured onsite.

Situated in Besançon, in a historic building, less than 1 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, L'adresse à Besançon is an apartment with a garden and barbecue facilities. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property provides a children's playground and outdoor furniture.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some fruits and chocolates or cookies. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

For visitors looking to embark on day trips to nearby landmarks, the apartment features a selection of packed lunches.

The apartment has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

hotel_name: Les Fabuleux appartements du Coeur de ville - Place Victor Hugo
description:

This apartment features free private parking and a minimarket. The apartment features family rooms.

All units include a private bathroom and have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a toaster. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Accommodation at the Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is serviced by a lift and has a living room with, free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. Each apartment also has, wire internet access and a kitchenette equipped with a microwave.

Breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room. This residence also provides a bike storage room, laundry facilities, a garage and free Wi-Fi at the reception.

You have the possibility to luch here our take-away formulas consisting of a hot dish, a drink and a dessert. Choose from a wide selection of dishes and relax over a tasty meal.

Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

This property is 18 km from the A36 motorway and private parking is available on site, at an extra cost and subject to availability.

The ibis Besançon La City offers air-conditioned rooms, 4 of which are equipped for people with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. The Bistro Régent restaurant offers a bistro menu based on fresh produce.

With a 24-hour front desk, this hotel offers secure underground parking at an extra fee.

Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage, formerly the Clarisses Monestary, is located in the historic district of Besançon, 500 metres from the citadel's ancient walls. It offers views of the tree-lined park, the medieval walls, the city and the Doubs Valley.

All of the rooms feature parquet flooring and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. They also have a flat-screen TV, telephone and a desk. Some rooms offer a view on the garden and on the city.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining area, on the terrace or can be brought to your guest room upon request. You can also relax on the west-facing terrace with a drink from the bar. Guest can access the spa upon reservation and for an additional fee.

Each room is air-conditioned and includes a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower. A buffet breakfast is available daily.

The palace Granvelle is 2 km from the hotel, and the UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Citadel Vaubon is 2.5 km away. Besançon town centre is a 15-minute walk away.

A buffet breakfast is offered every morning at this hotel. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or have dinner at the hotel's restaurant. A children's playground and meeting rooms are also available on site.

The hotel serves breakfast every morning for an additional fee. You can enjoy it in your room or as a buffet in the dining room. Room service is also available.

The small parking area, which includes 10 spaces, is only accessible by reservation for a supplementary fee of 15 EUR per space. An electric charging station is available on request and subject to availability at a rate of €25.

Please note that our parking area is only suitable for standard-sized vehicles (a small courtyard in the city center).

The establishment is 5 km from the Micropolis convention center. Public parking is available on-site for an extra charge. Please contact the establishment directly if you wish to reserve a parking space.

If you are traveling with pets, please contact the establishment directly to inquire about the pet policies. It is essential to contact the establishment.

You will be accommodated in one of our 41 rooms situated across various buildings as follows:

• The Main Building with elevator access, where we have 21 rooms.
• The Annex, also in the main building, without elevator access.
• The Hotel Pavilion, where we have 9 rooms, without an elevator.
• The Workshop, with 2 spacious rooms specially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

If you have a preference, feel free to let us know during your reservation. While we cannot guarantee, we promise to always do our best to accommodate the various requests of our guests.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk, wardrobe and telephone. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

hotel_name: Le Hameau d'Eguisheim - Chambres d'hôtes & Gîtes
description:

A breakfast is served each morning in the property’s former wine cellar. Guests can also relax in the adjacent, communal living area and or on the outdoor terrace, which has a view of the interior courtyard.

Activities such as hiking, mountain biking and Christmas markets are popular in the area. Eguisheim Christmas Market is 57 meters away.

2 apartments for up to 4 guests

This hotel is located in central Strasbourg, a 5-minute walk from the TGV train station and from Petite-France. It offers a wooden deck terrace and soundproofed accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

Guest rooms at the Grillon Hotel are individually decorated. They each have a TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a shower.

A breakfast buffet is served daily in the Grillon's dining room. The terrace also provides tables and chairs. In the evening you can enjoy a drink at the hotel bar.

The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception. A bicycle rental service is available on request. Place Kleber as well as the Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art are 700 metres away.

Located in Strasbourg, Adonis Hôtel Strasbourg offers guest rooms with a modern or baroque décor and free Wi-Fi access. It is 2.4 km from Strasbourg Cathedral and 20 km from Strasbourg-Entzheim International Airport.

All of the rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the communal lounge, with an additional cost. There is a restaurant 200 metres from the hotel.

Public parking is possible near the hotel at an extra cost and A35 Motorway is 1.4 km away.

Set 100 metres from Strasbourg Exhibition Centre, AC Hotel by Marriott Strasbourg offers 4-star accommodation in Strasbourg and features a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. Located around 600 metres from European Parliament, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.8 km away from St. Paul's Church. The hotel has family rooms.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available at the property.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are always at hand to help.

Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 2.5 km from AC Hotel by Marriott Strasbourg, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 2.6 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 13 km from the property.

Situated in Strasbourg, near Strasbourg Exhibition Centre, European Parliament and St. Paul's Church, Residence Inn by Marriott Strasbourg features a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel has facilities for disabled guests.

The aparthotel has a flat-screen TV. The kitchen features a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster, as well as coffee machine and kettle. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

Breakfast is available, and includes buffet, continental and American options.

Guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 2.5 km from the aparthotel, while Strasbourg Cathedral is 2.6 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 13 km away.

Mercure Lille Centre Grand Place is housed in a 19th-century building, situated in the centre of Lille a 3-minute walk from La Grande Place and and 850 metres from Lille Europe Train Station.

Decorated in modern tones, all rooms offer free WiFi access, a desk and tea and coffee making facilities. The rooms are also complete with an en suite bathroom.

Guests will enjoy a drink at the hotel bar, Le Royal. It serves a variety of cocktails and snacks throughout the day.

The hotel is 1-minute walk from the Opera, while the Old Lille District is 8 minutes away by walk. Pierre Mauroy Stadium is a 19-minute drive from the hotel and Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is a 6-minute walk away.

Calm Apparthotel is located in Lille just a 2-minute walk away from the Gare Lille Flandres metro, tram and train stations and the a 10-minute walk from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre. Guests can enjoy free WiFi.

The contemporary apartments at Calm Apparthotel are decorated in neutral tones. Each apartment offers a kitchenette, a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom.

Guests can prepare homemade meals in their private kitchenette equipped with a stove, microwave and a refrigerator. Restaurants and supermarkets can be found within a 5-minute walk.

The Lille-Lesquin Airport is 15 minutes away and the Citadel of Lille is 2 km away. Grand Palais is 900 metres away from Calm Apparthotel. Private parking is available at the aparthotel at an extra cost.

Located in Lille City Centre, this residence is 700 metres from the Grand Palais and a 15-minute drive from Lille Grand Palais Convention Centre. It offers modern apartments with free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV. Public parking is available on site.

The kitchenette in the soundproofed apartments includes a microwave, a fridge and a coffee maker. Each apartment features a seating area and dining area. All apartments have a private bathroom and are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served from Monday to Sunday at the Appart'city Lille Grand Palais and is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Cheeses and yogurts are also provided. Vending machines selling drinks are available at reception.

Lille-Flandres Train Station is 1 km from the hotel and Lille Grand Palais Metro Station is 900 metres away. The property is a 12-minute drive from Pierre Mauroy Stadium.

hotel_name: B&B HOTEL Lille Centre Grand Palais
description:
This hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Lille Grand Palais Metro station. With a 24-hour reception, it offers soundproofed rooms with free unlimited Wi-Fi, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A breakfast buffet is served daily at the B&B Lille Centre Grand Palais.

The B&B Lille Centre is 600 metres from the Lille Grand Palais and paid private underground parking is available subject to availability and reservation at the hotel.

Located next to Lille Flandre train station and in 5 minutes from the city centre, the Hotel Du Moulin d’Or is 900 metres from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre.

All the rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with shower. A flat-screen TV with French satellite channels and free internet access are provided in the room.

Breakfasts are served in the dining room or directly in your room and includes artisanal jam and fresh fruit salad. Animals are allowed within the hotel.

Lille Grand Palais is 650 metres from the property.

Located 1 km from Lille-Europe Train Station, Hotel Art Deco Euralille is situated in the heart of the Euralille business district. The Grand Place is a 20-minute walk away, while Lille Grand Palais and Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre are 1.7 km from Hotel Art Deco Euralille. This hotel features an on site bar.

Rooms are bright and have an Art Deco design. They each have air-conditioning, a satellite TV and free WiFi access. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the hotel’s bar, which features a stained glass ceiling from the 1930s and leather chairs. There is also a library at the disposal of guests.

Romarin Metro and Tram Station is located in front of the hotel and offers direct access to Lille Flandres Station.

On the Grand Place in Old Lille, Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place is set in a building of Flemish architecture and the rooms offer a marble bathroom and antique furniture. Rihour Metro Station is 100 metres away, Le Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is a 2-minute walk from the property and Lille Grand Palais is 1.4 km away.

The hotel was renovated in 2018. Each air-conditioned guest room is equipped with satellite TV and free WiFi access. The elegant, soundproofed rooms include a minibar and some have tea and coffee making facilities. Staff is available 24 hours a day.

An extensive and varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Grand Hotel Bellevue - Grand Place. Guests can enjoy cocktails in Le Windsor bar and there are restaurants 50 metres away.

The historic centre is a 5-minute walk and Lille Flandres Train Station is 900 metres away.  Bois de Boulogne Park and the Citadelle are 1.5 km away and Lesquin Airport is 11 km away. Meeting rooms are available on site. There is a public car park 100 metres away.

Alliance Lille - Couvent Des Minimes is a 17-century former convent located 5 minutes from the centre of Lille. Nouveau siecle Convention Centre is 450 metres from Alliance Lille Couvent des Minimes. The hotel offers a luxurious lounge area and patio covered by a glass roof.

Each air-conditioned room has stylish décor and equipped Canal+ satellite TV and a minibar. They also have a marble bathroom and free Wi-Fi access.

Le Jardin du Cloître restaurant serves a buffet breakfast daily and local cuisine based on fresh market products. L’Échiquier Piano Bar offers live entertainment every evening.

Alliance Lille - Couvent Des Minimes sits just 150 metres from Bois de Boulogne, a leafy 50-hectare park. It is also 15 minutes from both Lille Europe and Lille Flandre SNCF/TGV Train Stations by car. Lille Grand Palais is 6 km from Alliance Lille - Couvent Des Minimes, while Pierre Mauroy Stadium is 6 km away.

Located in the heart of Lille Old Town, this property offers 2 apartments located just a 10-minute walk from Lille Flandres Train Station, 2 km from Lille Grand Palais and 1.1 km from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre. You can admire the courtyard from the living room while browsing the free WiFi.

Set in an 18th-century building, Lille A Part is now decorated in a contemporary style and includes a seating area with a flat-screen TV. There is also a dining area and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hosts can provide a continental breakfast or you can prepare breakfast yourself using the toaster and Nespresso coffee machine. There are also hot-plates and a microwave for making hot meals.

Public parking with an additional charge is available near the apartment and Lille Europe Train Station is a 15-minute walk away. You may also choose to visit the Grand Place, also 15 minutes away on foot.

This hotel is located in the heart of Lille. It is 300 metres from Gare Lille Flandres, 750 metres from Gare de Lille Europe and 10 minutes from Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre by walk. It has views of the Gothic St Maurice Church, which is situated across from the hotel.

All rooms are furnished with antique furniture. They include free Wi-Fi access, a TV and a private bathroom.

The hotel Brueghel has a unique antique design with statues and paintings on displayed, also a feature is the 1930's lift that can take guests to their rooms.

A continental breakfast is served every morning, and the hotel offers 24-hour front desk service.

Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre is a 20-minute walk from Brueghel. Euralille and Les Tanneurs shopping centres are only 120 and 450 metres away.

Offering a terrace, Eklo Hotels Lille is set in Lille in the Nord-Pas-de-Calais Region, 2 km from Zénith of Lille. Lille Europe Train Station is 2.7 km away and Lille Flandres Train Station is 2.6 km away.

All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. Other services (toiletries and late check-out) are available at the hotel for an extra fee.

You will find a 24-hour front desk and a bar at the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant called Barbapizz', which serves pizzas and salads. A self-service continental breakfast is available daily at an extra cost.

A shared kitchen, a library as well as board games and a table football are at guests' disposal. Bicycle rental and electric charging stations for cars are available at an extra cost. The nearest airport is Lille Airport, 7 km from the property.  Free private parking is available on site.

Please kindly note Eklo Lille is labelled Green Key, the first tourist ecolabel.

Located in the centre of Lille, just next to Lille Flandres Train Station, Grand Hôtel Lille offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage and a lift. The hotel is 900 metres from Lille Grand Palais and 650 metres from Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre. Lille Old Town is a 5-minute walk away and the Grand Place is only 300 metres from the hotel.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a telephone. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at Grand Hôtel Lille. Guests can find a choice of restaurants within walking distance.

Additional features include free WiFi access and room service. Lille Europe Train Station is 600 metres away from the property and Gare Lille Flandres Metro Station is only 50 metres from the hotel. The hotel is a 18-minute drive from Pierre Mauroy Stadium.

Located 1 km from Lille Grand Palais and the Euralille business district, the Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais offers soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi. Free closed private parking is also available.

ATTENTION: the hotel is currently undergoing renovation and may be noisy during pre-set hours; however, everything is in place to welcome you in the best conditions.

Each room at Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais includes a flat-screen TV, telephone and tea and coffee-making facilities. The attractively decorated rooms feature a bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available every day. You can enjoy your meals 24 hours a day in the comfort of your room. After dinner, you can relax with a drink in the hotel bar or watch TV in the lounge. Other facilities include a meeting room.

The nearest metro station to the hotel is Caulier (Line 1), 450 meters away. The hotel is ideally located 7 minutes' walk from Lille Europe station and 10 minutes' walk from Lille Flandres station. The Zenith and Aéronef concert halls are 8 and 10 minutes' walk respectively, and the Grand Place is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

The Pierre Mauroy stadium is 10 km from the Kyriad Lille Gare - Grand Palais. The N356 motorway is within easy reach, a 3-minute drive away.

Located in Lille's Old Town, The People - Lille is a hostel offering shared dormitory rooms and private rooms. Lille Grand Place is only a 10-minute walk away and the train stations are a 20-minute walk from the property.

Each dormitory offers heating and shared bathroom facilities. Other rooms boast their own private bathroom.

Breakfast including sweet and savoury specialities is served every morning. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the evening. Local bars and nightclubs can be found within walking distance of the property.

Additional features include a 24-hour reception and free WiFi access throughout.

Lille's Citadelle is located 1 km from the property.

Well set in the centre of Lille, HOTEL AMBASSADEUR provides buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 2-star hotel offers a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is located 200 metres from Lille Flandres Train Station.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at HOTEL AMBASSADEUR also provide guests with a city view. All units in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Popular points of interest near HOTEL AMBASSADEUR include Zénith of Lille, Hospice Gantois and Grand Place Lille. Lille Airport is 9 km away.

Located 100 metres from Lille Flandres Train Station and less than a 10-minute walk from Lille Europe Train Station, ibis Lille Centre Gares offers 24-hour reception, an elevator, terrace and free Wi-Fi throughout. Lille Grand Palais is 650 metres away.

The rooms at ibis Lille Centre Gares are equipped with a flat-screen TV, telephone and desk. They also include a private bathroom with a shower and toilet.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

The restaurant, ibis Kitchen, serves traditional French cuisine. Safety deposit boxes are available upon request. Other facilities include 3 meeting rooms.

The ibis Lille Centre Gares is 8 km from Lesquin Airport, the Old Lille district is 1 km away, and private parking is available with a supplement, according to availability.

Set on a pedestrian shopping street in Lille City Centre, this low-cost hotel is 260 metres from the Palais des Beaux-Arts Museum, 1.2 km from Lille Grand Palais and 9 km from Pierre Mauroy Stadium. Rooms feature satellite TV and free internet access.

Each air-conditioned guest room at Lille City Hotel is equipped with a telephone. All of the rooms have a private bathroom and are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Lille City Hotel. There are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Lille-Flandres Train Station is just a 10-minute walk from Lille City Hotel. The Opera House and Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre are 600 metres from the hotel and the historic centre is 1 km away.

Mama Shelter Lille is located in the centre of Lille, a 4-minute walk from Lille Flandres Train and Metro Stations, as well as a 7-minute walk from Lille Europe Train Station. This hotel is also 600 metres from the Grand'Place and Lille's Opera.

The air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi and free video-on-demand. They also have a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Mama Shelter Lille. The restaurant serves homemade meals and guests can also enjoy cocktails at the bar .

Speaking 5 languages, staff are always on hand to help at the 24-hour front desk. The property also has laundry facilities, a concierge service and a car park.

Euralille shopping centre is 350 metres from the property and Lille Palace of Fine Arts is 1.4 km away, while Notre-Dame de la Treille Cathedral is 850 metres from Mama Shelter Lille. Lille-Lesquin Airport is 11 km away.

Conveniently set in Lille, Moxy Lille City provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. Private parking is available on site.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Popular points of interest near Moxy Lille City include Coilliot House, Printemps Gallery and Hospice Gantois. Lille Airport is 7 km away.

Located just 250 metres from Lille-Flandres Train Station, this 3-star hotel is set at the heart of the international business district. Pierre Mauroy Stadium is a 17-minute drive away. This hotel has a 24-hour reception and free internet access.

All soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a TV with cable channels. Each colourful room includes a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All rooms at Hotel Lille Europe are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and guests can use the microwave in the breakfast room featuring panoramic views.

Lille Europe hotel is accessible via the N356 motorway. The Opéra House is 750 metres from the hotel and Notre-Dame Basilica is a 10-minute walk away. Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 1.1 km from the hotel and the Grand Palais is 1.3 km from the hotel. Private parking on site is available and upon request only.

Hotel Chagnot is situated in Lille city centre, directly opposite Lille Flanders Train Station and a 10-minute walk from Lille-Europe Station. It offers modern accommodation and free Wi-Fi access. Nouveau Siecle Convention Centre and Grand Palais Convention Centre are both 1 km away.

All of the soundproofed guest rooms have a private bathroom with shower and they are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

Hotel Chagnot serves an express breakfast to takeaway.

The hotel is located 8.8 km from Lille-Lesquin Airport. Le Palais des Beaux-Arts Museum is 15-minute walk from the hotel. Department stores Printemps and Galeries Lafayette are a 10-minute walk away, while the Opéra de Lille is 450 metres away. Pierre Mauroy Stadium is a 16-minute drive away.

Located in Lille, Hotel Ibis Budget Lille Gares Vieux-Lille is 400 metres from the Old District and 400 metres from Grand'Place. It offers free WiFi access and a 24-hour front desk.

Serviced by a lift, each non-smoking room features a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Extras include a desk and bed linen.

There are vending machines for drinks on site and a large range of restaurants can be found in the area.

Hotel Ibis Budget Lille Gares Vieux-Lille is 750 metres from Lille- Europe Railway Station and 600 metres from Lille Flandres Train Station. Lille Airport is 8 km away.

hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express Lille Centre by IHG
description:
Located in Lille city centre, this hotel is 350 metres from Lille’s Palais des Beaux Arts and 9 km from Pierre Mauroy Stadium. Nouveau Siècle Convention Centre is 900 metres from the property and Lille Grand Palais is 2 km away.

Rooms at the Holiday Inn Express Lille Centre are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a telephone, hairdryer and tea and coffee making facilities. All rooms are serviced by a lift. Free WiFi access is available.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast daily.

The Holiday Inn Express Lille Centre offers a 24-hour reception desk and secured, underground parking (subject to availability). Additional facilities include 1 meeting room and a dry-cleaning service.

The nearest Metro Station is République Beaux Arts, which offers direct access to Lille Europe and Lille Flandres Train Stations. The hotel is located 800 metres from La Grande Place and 1.5 km from The Citadel of Lille.

hotel_name: ibis Styles Lille Centre Gare Beffroi
description:
The ibis Styles Lille Centre Gare Beffroi is located in the centre of Lille, 600 metres from Lille Flandres and Lille Europe train stations. Lille Grand Palais Convention Centre and Nouveau Siecle Convention are both 1 km away.

All rooms come with a private shower room, free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV.

Breakfast is served every morning. Guests can relax at the bar and corporate events can be catered for in three modern meeting rooms.

It is a 10-minute walk from the Euralille business and shopping district. The hotel is a 15-minute drive  from Pierre Mauroy Stadium.

Boasting inner courtyard views, Cocon centre ville - gare features accommodation with a patio, around 3.1 km from Zénith d'Amiens. The property is situated 3.8 km from University of Picardie Jules Verne, 8.7 km from Amiens Golf Club and 23 km from French-Australian Museum. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Amiens Train Station is less than 1 km away.

The apartment is located on the ground floor and has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a toaster and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Berny's Museum, The Floating gardens Park and Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 66 km from the property.

Situated in Amiens, "Au jardin sur l'eau" Hortillonnages features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Around 2.3 km from The Floating gardens Park, the property also offers free WiFi. The guest house has family rooms.

The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Guests at the guest house can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The nearest airport is Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport, 65 km from the accommodation.

Located in Amiens, 1.5 km from Amiens Train Station and 5.1 km from Zénith d'Amiens, Le Cottage des Hortillonnages offers a garden and air conditioning. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are available at the apartment free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from The Floating gardens Park.

The apartment with a terrace and lake views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests at Le Cottage des Hortillonnages will be able to enjoy activities in and around Amiens, like fishing. The accommodation has a picnic area and a barbecue.

Berny's Museum is 1.7 km from Le Cottage des Hortillonnages, while Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens is 1.7 km away. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 66 km from the property.

hotel_name: Appartement Les Jardins de Jules Verne - Côté Jardin
description:
Boasting garden views, Appartement Les Jardins de Jules Verne - Côté Jardin features accommodation with a garden and a terrace, around 2.8 km from Zénith d'Amiens. The property is situated 1.5 km from Berny's Museum, 2.4 km from The Floating gardens Park and 1.4 km from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Amiens Train Station is 1.7 km away.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

University of Picardie Jules Verne is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Amiens Golf Club is 9.4 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 63 km away.

Set within 2.8 km of Zénith d'Amiens and 900 metres of Berny's Museum in Amiens, Odalys City Amiens Blamont offers accommodation with free WiFi.

The studios all have a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, kettle, and a fridge. There is also a flat-screen TV.

The Floating Gardens Park is a 13-minute walk from the aparthotel, while Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens is an 11-minute walk from Odalys City Amiens Blamont. Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport is 50 km away.

hotel_name: un Nid en Ville -Amiens Centre ville avec Parking
description:
Situated in Amiens and only 1.3 km from Amiens Train Station, un Nid en Ville -Amiens Centre ville avec Parking features accommodation with city views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property has inner courtyard views and is less than 1 km from Berny's Museum and 1.9 km from The Floating gardens Park. The property is non-smoking and is located 3 km from Zénith d'Amiens.

This air-conditioned apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens is less than 1 km from the apartment, while University of Picardie Jules Verne is 3.7 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 64 km away.

Offering city views and free bikes, Coeur de ville features accommodation ideally located in Amiens, within a short distance of Amiens Train Station, Berny's Museum and The Floating gardens Park. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also have free WiFi. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

For guests with children, the apartment offers outdoor play equipment. A car rental service is available at Coeur de ville.

Zénith d'Amiens is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens is 200 metres from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 65 km away.

Situated in Amiens, less than 1 km from Amiens Train Station, 4.5 km from Zénith d'Amiens and 100 metres from The Floating gardens Park, LES JARDINS avec terrasse features accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This apartment offers accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Berny's Museum.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and toaster, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens is 1 km from the apartment, while University of Picardie Jules Verne is 5.2 km from the property. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 66 km away.

hotel_name: Le Nid - Studio in Hypercentre - Cathédrale
description:
Le Nid - Studio in Hypercentre - Cathédrale is set in Amiens, 3.6 km from Zénith d'Amiens, less than 1 km from The Floating gardens Park, and a 3-minute walk from Berny's Museum. The property is around 300 metres from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens, 5 km from University of Picardie Jules Verne and 8 km from Amiens Golf Club. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Amiens Train Station.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and fridge.

French-Australian Museum is 24 km from the apartment, while Somme Trench Museum is 29 km away. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 68 km from the property.

Located 300 metres from Notre Dame Cathedral in Amiens and from the Hortillonnages Floating Gardens, Appart'City Confort Amiens Gare features self-catering studios with LCD TVs, and a fully equipped kitchenette. The Picardy Museum is 1 km away and the city's train station is a 5-minute walk away.

The studios also include a bathroom with a walk-in shower, a telephone and a work desk. The studios include wired and WiFi free internet access.

A buffet breakfast is served every day. Breakfast is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit and fruit salad, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided.

You can visit Amiens Belfry, which is 1.5 km away or play golf 8 km away. The A29 motorway is 3.2 km away from Appart'City Confort Amiens Gare.

Offering a restaurant and free Wi-Fi, B&B HOTEL  Amiens Centre Cathédrale is located in the centre of Amiens.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV and a desk. The private bathrooms come with a shower.

At B&B HOTEL Amiens Centre Cathédrale you will find a 24-hour front desk, a bar and a snack bar. Other facilities offered include luggage storage. A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

The hotel is 1.3 km from Zénith d'Amiens, 800 m from Berny's Museum and 1.1 km from Amiens Train Station. Beauvais Tillé Airport is 50 km away. The property offers parking at an extra cost.

Boasting a shared lounge and views of city, Ginkgo Maison d'hôtes is a guest house set in a historic building in Amiens, 1.3 km from Amiens Train Station. Among the facilities at this property are full-day security and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guest house has family rooms.

At the guest house, every unit is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The guest house features some units with inner courtyard views, and the units are equipped with a kettle. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the guest house will be able to enjoy activities in and around Amiens, like walking tours.

Popular points of interest near Ginkgo Maison d'hôtes include Berny's Museum, The Floating gardens Park and Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens. Beauvais–Tillé Airport is 64 km from the property.

Ibis budget Amiens Centre Gare is set in Amiens city centre, a 5-minute walk from Amiens Train Station and a 15-minute walk from Notre-Dame of Amiens Cathedral. Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

A buffet breakfast can en enjoyed every morning.

The nearest airport is Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport, 50 km from the hotel.

hotel_name: Plein centre - Parking securisé gratuit - 2 couchages
description:

description:

description:

The property is around 200 metres from Berny's Museum, 200 metres from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens and 5 km from University of Picardie Jules Verne. expectations.

description:

description:

Guest rooms are air-conditioned and feature parquet flooring. They include flat-screen TV, free WiFi and a spacious bathroom.

The terrace has a panoramic sea view. The open-air hot tub is located on the patio. The modern fitness room includes the latest exercise equipment and massages are offered at an extra cost.

The lounge bar in the Oceania Saint Malo offers a variety of cocktails and drinks and can accommodate private cocktail parties. It also offers a dining menu for evening meals. Breakfast is served daily.

The former was built in the early 17th century and the latter is a more modern building. All rooms are comfortable and equipped with modern en suite facilities.

Free Wi-Fi internet in the entire property. In the stone-walled cellar, enjoy your breakfast under 400 year old exposed wooden beams.

In the vicinity of Hotel Elizabeth you will find the 18th-century House of Pirates, Saint Servan, the city of Aleth, and the museum of Cap Horniers. You can also enjoy a walk on the ramparts and the beach of Sillon.

It has free and secure parking for your vehicle.

The establishment also has a spa with heated indoor swimming pool, accessible from 3 years old, with a whirlpool bath area, water slides for the back, a sauna, a hammam, and a fitness room with 3 equipment.

Our continental breakfast is served daily in the dining room as a buffet. You can also take advantage of the coworking spaces during the day, as WIFI is available throughout the hotel.

The bar is open every day until 10:30 p.m., and a snack service is available 24 hours a day.

Our modern and refined rooms are all equipped with safes, showers in the bathrooms, and air conditioning.

description:

Both free WiFi and parking on-site are accessible at the apartment free of charge. Outdoor seating is also available at T2 terrasse de charme à Rochebonne 400 m plage.

Just 280 metres from Saint-Malo Marina and a mere 500 metres from the beach and the English Channel, our hotel boasts a modern décor and air-conditioned guest rooms equipped with complimentary internet access.
Each room features flat-screen TVs for your entertainment. With en suite bathrooms and plush carpet flooring, our guest rooms offer the ultimate in comfort and relaxation, fully renovated to meet your needs.
Indulge in a buffet-style breakfast each morning, served in our inviting breakfast area or the privacy of your own room.
Conveniently located, Saint-Malo Cathedral is a mere 120 metres away, while the Saint-Malo Train Station is just a 5-minute drive from our doorstep.
While our central location ensures easy exploration of the city, we understand that it also means exposure to its lively activities. Rest assured, all windows at Hotel Cartier Intramuros are equipped with double glazing to minimise any potential disturbances. While we cannot guarantee complete silence, we strive to provide a peaceful retreat for our guests.

The Mouton Blanc restaurant offers local traditional cuisine, served in the dining room or the terrace. Breakfast is served daily.
