Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Mercure Pont d’Avignon Centre is located in the historic centre of Avignon, just 100 metres from the Pont d'Avignon and 150 metres  from Papal Palace. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar with the outdoor shaded terrace.

The restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine with local and seasonal products. Breakfast is served each morning in a designated breakfast room under a glass roof.

Every room comes with air conditioning, a safe, a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and meeting rooms that can accommodate up to 150 people. The hotel also has a fitness room available 24/7.

Caumont Airport is 9 km from Mercure Pont d’Avignon. Avignon Chateaublanc golf course is 10 km away. Avignon Central Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. The hotel has direct access to a covered public car park, accessible for an additional charge. Guests can benefit from a 20% reduction on the car park upon presentation of the ticket at reception.

hotel_name: Mini-loft, Clos des Arts - parking gratuit
description:
Set 700 metres from Avignon Central Station and less than 1 km from Papal Palace in the centre of Avignon, Mini-loft, Clos des Arts - parking gratuit offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. It is located 10 km from Parc des Expositions Avignon and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 5.3 km from Avignon TGV Train Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some fruits and chocolates or cookies. The property offers quiet street views.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Arles Amphitheatre is 41 km from the apartment, while Parc Expo Nîmes is 49 km away.

Set in Avignon, L'îlot bambou is a guest house with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Boasting a garden, this property is situated near attractions such as Papal Palace. The property is 600 metres from Pont d'Avignon.

Guest rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a hair dryer, rooms at the bed and breakfast also have free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a terrace.

A continental breakfast is served daily at the property.

You can play table tennis at L'îlot bambou.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Avignon City Hall, Ceccano Media Library and CCI de Vaucluse. Avignon-Provence Airport is 10 km from the property while Avignon TGV Train Station is a 10-minute drive away.

hotel_name: Hôtel Le Médiéval Palais des Papes
description:
Le Médiéval is set in a former cardinal's palace in Avignon historic centre. This 17th-century building is a 5-minute walk from the Popes Palace and offers a floral patio with a fountain.

Accessed via a staircase, each air-conditioned room has a satellite TV and some feature a bathtub. They are also equipped with a direct dial phone, a work desk and free WiFi is available in the entire hotel Le Medieval.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and the hotel is close to many shops and restaurants.

The hotel includes a TV room and a library.

Le Medieval is 5 km from Avignon TGV train Station and 10 km from Avignon Airport. Public parking is available nearby at a discounted rate.

Situated in Avignon’s city centre, Hotel d'Angleterre features free WiFi access. There is a 24-hour reception. Avignon Centre Train Station is 10 minutes' walk away.

The air-conditioned guestrooms at d'Angleterre come with a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom. They are decorated in a contemporary style.

A continental breakfast is served daily in the lounge area. Newspapers and refreshments are also provided throughout the day.

Pont d'Avignon is 1.2 km from Hotel d'Angleterre. The nearest airport is Avignon Caumont Airport, 10 km from Hotel d'Angleterre.

hotel_name: Bateau Hotel à quai Le Chardonnay
description:
Bateau Hotel à quai Le Chardonnay has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Avignon. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a range of water sports facilities and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 800 metres from Papal Palace.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower. The units feature a wardrobe.

An à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available at the property.

Guests at Bateau Hotel à quai Le Chardonnay will be able to enjoy activities in and around Avignon, like hiking.

Avignon Central Station is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Avignon TGV Train Station is 4.7 km from the property.

Offering an outdoor swimming pool and garden view, Villa Aigarden maison d'hôtes is located in Avignon, 1.7 km from Avignon Central Station and 1.8 km from Papal Palace. It is situated 5.8 km from Avignon TGV Train Station and provides a housekeeping service. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The units in the guest house are fitted with a kettle. Units come complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, while certain units at the guest house also offer a seating area. At the guest house, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the guest house can enjoy an à la carte or a continental breakfast.

Guests at Villa Aigarden maison d'hôtes will be able to enjoy activities in and around Avignon, like cycling and hiking. The guest house features a barbecue, outdoor fireplace and sun terrace.

Parc des Expositions Avignon is 9.3 km from the accommodation, while Arles Amphitheatre is 41 km away.

Set in central Avignon, a 15-minute walk from Palais des Papes and Pont d'Avignon, this 16th-century hotel offers an outdoor rooftop pool with a large sun terrace. Some of the stylish rooms are located in the historic building featuring archways and vaulted ceilings. Free WiFi is available.

Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are non-smoking and have a contemporary bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms feature a balcony with views of the courtyard.

Restaurant Le Saint Louis serves traditional French cuisine at Hôtel Cloitre Saint Louis. Guests can dine on the terrace in summer and enjoy drinks in the lounge bar. A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning. An in-room breakfast can be enjoyed at extra cost.

Calvet Museum and Avignon Train Station are a 5-minute walk from the hotel and Avignon Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Private parking is available.

The Kyriad Palais des Papes welcomes you to the heart of the historic center, on Place de l'Horloge.
You'll be across from the opera, 75 meters from the Palais des Papes and the Centre des Congrès, and 500 meters from the Pont d'Avignon.

Accommodation is air-conditioned and includes a courtesy tray, fridge and flat-screen satellite TV. Private bathrooms feature a hairdryer and bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast of pastries, cold meats, fresh fruit and hot or cold drinks is served every morning.

Reception is open 24 hours a day.
The hotel has no private parking lot, but offers discounts on various public parking lots nearby.
Please contact the hotel for further details.

hotel_name: La Maison Racine 3 -Charmant studio au cœur du CV
description:
Situated right in the heart of Avignon, 400 metres from Papal Palace, La Maison Racine 3 -Charmant studio au cœur du CV features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property is around 4.6 km from Avignon TGV Train Station, 12 km from Parc des Expositions Avignon and 40 km from Arles Amphitheatre. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Avignon Central Station.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Parc Expo Nîmes is 48 km from the apartment, while Pont d'Avignon is 400 metres from the property.

hotel_name: Les Carmes - Le charme de la pierre en Intras Muros
description:
Set in Avignon, less than 1 km from Papal Palace and 6 km from Avignon TGV Train Station, Les Carmes - Le charme de la pierre en Intras Muros offers city views and free WiFi. The property is around 12 km from Parc des Expositions Avignon, 41 km from Arles Amphitheatre and 1.1 km from Pont d'Avignon. The property is 1.4 km from Avignon Central Station, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

La Petite Saunerie offers B&B accommodation in Avignon's historical centre. Free WiFi access is available.

All guestrooms feature a city view, a coffee machine and a private bathroom. The Deluxe Double Room also offers a seating area.

Breakfast is included and served every morning. Restaurants and bars can be found a short walk away.

The bed and breakfast is 700 metres from Pont d'Avignon, 300 metres from the Papal Palace and 4.5 km from Avignon TGV Train Station.

hotel_name: Le Petit Avignon - chambres & appartement à deux pas du Pont d'Avignon et du Palais des Papes
description:
Set in the centre of Avignon, Le Petit Avignon - chambres & appartement à deux pas du Pont d'Avignon et du Palais des Papes is a recently renovated accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. The property has quiet street views and is 500 metres from Papal Palace and 1.1 km from Avignon Central Station. The bed and breakfast features family rooms.

The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and a desk. The units are fitted with a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms will provide you with a terrace and some have inner courtyard views. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Avignon TGV Train Station is 4.4 km from the bed and breakfast, while Parc des Expositions Avignon is 12 km away.

Located opposite the Université Sainte Marthe, just a 15-minute walk from the Palais des Papes and the historical centre of Avignon, Apart'Hotel Sainte-Marthe offers self-catering apartments and free WiFi access throughout. Splashworld Waterpark is 23 km away.

The air-conditioned apartments feature a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe, a fully-equipped kitchenette, and the private bathrooms are complete with a shower or bathtub.

Some apartments have a terrace with views of Avignon, and some apartments have easy access for people with reduced mobility.

A continental buffet breakfast is available onsite daily from 07:30 to 10:00, upon reservation and for an extra charge.

Apart'Hotel Sainte-Marthe is a 5-minute drive from Avignon Train Station, free public parking is possible nearby and private parking is available on site with a supplement.

If you are arriving by foot, you can access the property via boulevard Limbert. If you are arriving by car, the Apart'Hotel can be accessed via rue du Théâtre.

hotel_name: Avignon Intra-muros, vue Palais des Papes
description:
In a central area of Avignon, located within a short distance of Papal Palace and Avignon Central Station, Avignon Intra-muros, vue Palais des Papes offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. The property has city and quiet street views, and is 5.7 km from Avignon TGV Train Station. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a lift and organising tours for guests.

The spacious apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and fruits. The apartment offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Avignon, like cycling, hiking and walking tours.

Parc des Expositions Avignon is 11 km from Avignon Intra-muros, vue Palais des Papes, while Arles Amphitheatre is 41 km away.

La Banasterie is the oldest B&B in Avignon, dating back to the year 1521 and it is located in the heart of the city just 50 metres from the Palais des Papes. It offers a terrace, flowered patio and library.

Individually decorated, all air-conditioned rooms, TV, wardrobe and a Nespresso coffee machine, and Damman teas. The en suite bathroom is complete with a hairdryer and free eco-friendly toiletries.

A continental breakfast is provided each morning at La Banasterie. Guests can also sample traditional cuisine in the restaurants found within walking distance. Four lounges are available, one includes a bar and an other features a library.

The famous Pont d’Avignon is just a 3-minute walk away and the Cathedral is 50 metres from the B&B. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout and Avignon Airport is ideally located 15 km away. Public parking is available nearby at an extra cost.

The 4 private apartments feature a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a washing machine.

Restaurants can be found 100 metres away.

Marseille Provence Airport is located 65 km from the property. The property offers free private parking.

The Mercure Avignon Gare TGV welcomes you to Avignon, 600m from the TGV station and less than 10 minutes by car from the city center, its central train station and the Palais des Papes. The hotel offers free WiFi access.

Guest rooms feature a satellite TV and the bathrooms have a large shower. The hotel also offers rooms with access for guests with reduced mobility.

A breakfast buffet is served daily and guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar.

Guests can visit the Pont d'Avignon, 4 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

Situated in Avignon, 3.3 km from Avignon Central Station, Villa Pauline features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a garden. The property features pool and garden views, and is 5.4 km from Papal Palace. The bed and breakfast has family rooms.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also feature free WiFi, while some rooms also boast a terrace. At the bed and breakfast, units have bed linen and towels.

Breakfast can be enjoyed on-site, which includes fresh pastries and fruits.

Avignon TGV Train Station is 8 km from the bed and breakfast, while Parc des Expositions Avignon is 11 km from the property.

Located within 700 metres of Papal Palace and 700 metres of Avignon Central Station in the centre of Avignon, Villa Victor Hugo by Odomo provides accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. This recently renovated apartment is located 4.8 km from Avignon TGV Train Station and 11 km from Parc des Expositions Avignon. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, a microwave, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with an outdoor dining area. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Arles Amphitheatre is 40 km from the apartment, while Parc Expo Nîmes is 48 km away. Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport is 57 km from the property.

Ideally located inside the ramparts in the centre of Avignon, Hôtel Le Bristol offers air-conditioned rooms, a bar, free WiFi and a shared lounge. There is also a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service.

Just a 15-minute walk to the Palais des Papes, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at Hôtel Le Bristol can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 9 km from Hôtel Le Bristol.

hotel_name: Best Western Le Galice Centre Ville
description:
Located a 10-minute walk from the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Best Western Le Galice Centre Ville features a seasonal outdoor pool and a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a desk, a kettle and a minibar. The private bathrooms have a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

The hotel has business facilities, including fully equipped meeting rooms open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. There is also a 24-hour reception.

Best Western Le Galice Centre Ville is 25 km from Marseille Provence Airport and 15 km from Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station. A secured underground car park is available for an extra fee.

In the heart of Aix-en-Provence, the La Caravelle hotel welcomes you less than an 8-minute walk from the Cours Mirabeau, the Granet Museum and the Palais des Congrès.

All rooms have air conditioning, a desk and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A la carte breakfast is served every morning at La Caravelle. A continental breakfast is also available at a reduced rate includes a hot drink, a croissant, a glass of fruit juice, bread, butter and jam.

The hotel includes video surveillance and free computer access in public areas. Public parking is nearby, and a private parking is also available on site for an additional fee (reservation is needed before arrival, 3 spots available)

Establishment undergoing renovation but remains open to the public.
Model photos of the establishment from 2024.

This hotel has been entirely renewed.

hotel_name: L'Escapade Aixoise hyper centre historique studios free netfilx wifi romantics apartments historic center
description:

Domaine de Saint Clair is an adults-only Bed&Breakfast located just 3.3 km (10 minutes) from the historic center of Aix-en-Provence.

The guest rooms at Domaine de Saint Clair are located in a Provençal house, independent of the mansion. The Domaine de Saint Clair offers only 3 spacious suites to guarantee peace and privacy, in a privileged setting. The suites of 30 m2 each are recently restored and warmly decorated.

The house is fully air-conditioned and has free Wi-Fi internet access.

All suites overlook a large shared terrace with a view of a wooded garden. Their private bathroom has a walk-in shower and all necessary amenities.

The Domaine offers a large outdoor swimming pool, open in season, sunny all day and lined with century-old pines providing shade in the garden surrounding the swimming pool.

A continental breakfast is served on the seasonal terrace or in the breakfast room.

The Estate benefits from an exceptional location, offering the tranquility of the Aix countryside and proximity to the bustling city all year round, with its narrow streets, rich mansions, magnificent fountains and café terraces...

Secure private parking is available free of charge.

The Luberon region is a 25-minute drive away from Domaine de Saint Clair and Les Baux-de-Provence in the Alpilles region is 44 minutes from the property.
Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.6 for a two-person trip.

hotel_name: Centre d'Aix - charmant appartement 1 chambre Pythagore avec parking
description:
Located 30 km from Joliette Metro Station, 31 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and 31 km from Vieux Port Metro station, Centre d'Aix - charmant appartement 1 chambre Pythagore avec parking provides accommodation set in Aix-en-Provence. Featuring a private garden with 2 terraces and an on-site restaurant, Hôtel Particulier le 28 is located in Aix-en-Provence. Private parking is available on site. Acces and treatment on reservation

The air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a bath. Hôtel Particulier le 28 features free WiFi.

hotel_name: Le Discret - Un Voyage en Provence
description:
Le Discret - Un Voyage en Provence in Aix-en-Provence features accommodation with free WiFi, 30 km from Joliette Metro Station, 31 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and 31 km from Vieux Port Metro station. The property is around 32 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, 32 km from Castellane Metro Station and 32 km from Saint-Ferreol Street. The property is 30 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

This air-conditioned apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Timone Metro Station is 33 km from the apartment, while Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica is 33 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 26 km away.

This iconic hotel in Aix-en-Provence, renowned for its French gardens and fountains, celebrated its centenary under the theme of renewal. Jacques Garcia redesigned the reception area, the Bar, and the Pigonnet's restaurant, La Table du Pigonnet.

A new experience, Les Amis, invites guests to savor the flavors of Provence with conviviality, whether in the gardens, at the bar, or in the comfort of their room, thanks to a versatile menu showcasing local flavors, available to enjoy in various settings. This new place celebrates those who have brought life and soul to this century-old residence through their art —writing, composing music, painting—and by commemorating life’s milestones such as birthdays, engagements, and other cherished moments.

Among the 55 rooms, three exceptional suites have been created, opening onto terraces and sitting areas with views of the lush surroundings. The bastide, nestled in the heart of three hectares, shares this haven of peace with two villas, perfect for private moments.

A new 350 m² spa, called Folie Verte, is expected in spring 2025. This wellness offering will celebrate the gardens and poetry of Le Pigonnet with holistic treatments, including body care, HydraFacial, singing lessons, and art therapy.

Conveniently located just steps from the vibrant heart of Aix-en-Provence, this century-old residence, a member of the Esprit de France – Hôtels & Demeures collection, reinvents the art of Provençal living.

Boasting a garden, private pool and garden views, La Chambre Cézanne is situated in Aix-en-Provence. Housed in a building dating from 2021, this bed and breakfast is 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 31 km from Joliette Metro Station. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The unit is air conditioned and is comprised of a terrace with outdoor furniture as well as a flat-screen TV with streaming services. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 32 km from the bed and breakfast, while Vieux Port Metro station is 32 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 27 km away.

The property is 31 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Saint-Ferreol Street is 33 km from Studio Aix Centre Historique, while La Timone Metro Station is 34 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 27 km away.

Le Mas des Pignes -adults only, a property with a garden, is situated in Aix-en-Provence, 33 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, 33 km from Joliette Metro Station, as well as 34 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. With garden views, this accommodation provides a terrace and a swimming pool. The bed and breakfast features rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi.

The units provide views of the mountain and come with a seating area, a washing machine, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Vieux Port Metro station is 34 km from the bed and breakfast, while Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 34 km from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 29 km away.

Located just of the famous Cours Mirabeau in the heart of the old town of Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Les Augustins is set within the walls of a 12th-century convent.

Hotel Les Augustins boasts a subtle blend of historic and modern architecture and a magnificent lobby.

The hotel features spacious rooms combining traditional architecture and modern facilities. Each room provides air conditioning, a TV and a minibar.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of guest rooms. There is also free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel and a 24-hour reception,

Les Quatre Dauphins is a hotel set in a former private mansion in the heart of Aix-en-Provence, just 50 metres away from Quatre Dauphins Square and 350 metres from Cours Mirabeau. The property is a 5-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence Train Station. Free WiFi is included.

An elegant stairwell leads to the guest rooms in this 3-storey hotel (please note, we do not have an elevator). Decorated in a Provençal style, each room comes with private bathroom and satellite TV. The rooms of the top floor have exposed wooden beams.

The central location of the Quatre Dauphins hotel allows you to visit the old part of Aix-en-Provence. Paid public parking is available 300 metres from the property.

hotel_name: Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix en Provence Centre - MGallery
description:
Located just a 5-minute walk from Cours Mirabeau and the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix en Provence Centre - MGallery is a 4-star hotel featuring a heated seasonal outdoor pool open from April to the end of september. It also boasts a terrace, a fitness centre and free WiFi access.
Each air-conditioned guest room has been decorated in a contemporary style and includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a safe. The private bathroom comes with either a bath or shower, bathrobes, a hairdryer, slippers and free Occitane toiletries. All rooms have a Nespresso coffee machine.

The property is around 4.8 km from La Favière, 22 km from Villa Noailles Art Centre and 29 km from Penitents Chapel. The property is non-smoking and is situated 29 km from Chateau de Grimaud.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bormes-les-Mimosas, like cycling. A water park and outdoor play equipment are available for guests at Studio 3 pers coeur de village Bormes les Mimosas.

Port Grimaud is 31 km from the accommodation. Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 21 km from the property.

Hotel La Voile is ideally situated just 400 metres from the beaches and Bormes harbour in a quiet, peaceful environment near the village of La Favière. There is an outdoor heated pool and a lounge bar.

Some of the guestrooms offer a view of the sea or garden. Choose from single or double rooms, some of which can accommodate up to 4 people.

A buffet breakfast is available in the dining area every morning for an extra charge. The hotel can also recommend a range of restaurants in the local area.

Hotel La Voile is located near the charming medieval village of Bormes Les Mimosas and less than 100 metres from the local shops and restaurants. The surrounding area offers a variety of nautical and outdoor activities. Private parking is available upon request with a supplement.

Located in Bormes-les-Mimosas, the recently renovated Les Terrasses de Lô provides accommodation 2.7 km from Plage de l'Anglade and 2.9 km from Grande Plage. This property offers access to a terrace and free private parking. Guests can enjoy mountain views.

The units at the bed and breakfast feature private entrance and soundproofing so guests can enjoy a peaceful stay. The units include a private bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen.

Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy an à la carte breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available. There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available.

A water park is available on-site and cycling can be enjoyed within close proximity of Les Terrasses de Lô.

Chateau de Grimaud is 31 km from the accommodation, while Le Pont des Fées is 31 km from the property. Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 22 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Set in the medieval village of Bornes-les-Mimosas, this 3-star hotel is just a 25-minute drive from Toulon. It offers an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by mimosas and individually decorated guest rooms.

The rooms and suites at Hostellerie du Cigalou also include an LCD TV and an en suite bathroom. Each one is air-conditioned and a minibar can be added to the accommodation upon request.

The buffet breakfast can be served in the dining room or on the communal terrace. The hotel also has an on-site bar and restaurant, which offer Provencal specialities and cocktails.

Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and free public parking is possible near the hotel. Other local attractions include the towns of Hyères and Saint-Tropez, both less than 30 km away.

Located in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 29 km from Chateau de Grimaud, 30 km from Le Pont des Fées and 39 km from Toulon Train Station, The Little House provides accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 4.7 km from La Favière, 22 km from Villa Noailles Art Centre and 29 km from Penitents Chapel. The property is non-smoking and is situated 39 km from Zénith Oméga Toulon.

The holiday home with a terrace and city views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the holiday home. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Port Grimaud is 31 km from the holiday home. Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 21 km away.

Offering city views, Bormes - Le Loft is an accommodation set in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 33 km from Le Pont des Fées and 39 km from Toulon Train Station. Featuring sea and garden views, this apartment also offers free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 33 km from Chateau de Grimaud.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property offers inner courtyard views.

Zénith Oméga Toulon is 39 km from the apartment, while La Favière is 5.7 km away. Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 21 km from the property.

Set 42 km from Golf du Luberon and offering a garden, Clos Augusta 2 features accommodation in Riez. Featuring free private parking, the 3-star apartment is 38 km from ITER / Cadarache. The property is non-smoking and is situated 35 km from Digne Golf Course.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and garden views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the quiet street views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Marseille Provence Airport is 110 km from the property.

hotel_name: "Les Lauriers" chambre indépendante avec terrasse privée
description:
Chambre D'Hôtes "Les Lauriers" chambre indépendante avec terrasse privée offers accommodation in Moustiers-Sainte-Marie.

Each room has a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. Rooms have a private bathroom.

Gréoux-les-Bains is 28 km from Chambre D'Hôtes "Les Lauriers" chambre indépendante avec terrasse privée, while Manosque is 35 km from the property. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 82 km from the property.

Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a patio, La Maison du Courtil, Citron-Caramel is located in Moustiers-Sainte-Marie. The property has city and inner courtyard views. The property is non-smoking and is situated 41 km from Digne Golf Course.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, like hiking.

Marseille Provence Airport is 123 km away.

Set in Bauduen in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, Villa Castellane has a garden. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 48 km from Saint-Endréol Golf Club.

This apartment features 1 bedroom, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 108 km from the property.

A recently renovated bed and breakfast in Castellane, Bnb Castellane Chambre d'Hotes B&B offers sun terrace, private parking and sports facilities. It is set 20 km from Château de Taulane Golf Course and offers full-day security. Guests can make use of the picnic area or the seasonal outdoor pool, or enjoy views of the mountain and garden.

At the bed and breakfast, the units come with a desk. Units are fitted with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a balcony and some have inner courtyard views. At the bed and breakfast, the units have bed linen and towels.

Continental and Italian breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

You can play tennis at the bed and breakfast, and the area is popular for walking tours. Skiing, cycling and hiking are possible within the area, and Bnb Castellane Chambre d'Hotes B&B offers ski storage space.

Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 85 km from the property.

hotel_name: La casa Elisa Gîte T2 indépendant
description:
Located in Gréoux-les-Bains, 17 km from ITER / Cadarache and 23 km from Golf du Luberon, La casa Elisa Gîte T2 indépendant offers a garden and air conditioning. The holiday home also provides free WiFi, free private parking and facilities for disabled guests.

The holiday home with a terrace and garden views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the holiday home. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Marseille Provence Airport is 80 km away.

hotel_name: Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence
description:
Located 500 metres from the village and 800 metres from the thermal baths,Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence consists of 3 small complexes. It includes 3 swimming pools and relaxation facilities.

The apartments at Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence are equipped with a kitchenette including hotplates, a microwave, an oven, and a dishwasher.

The apartments situated on the ground floor boast a private garden and all others feature their own terrace.

Résidence Odalys La Licorne de Haute Provence boasts 2 outdoor swimming pools and 1 indoor swimming pool. Sports-enthusiasts will appreciate the residence’s fitness centre.

You can also enjoy unwinding in the spa with its hot tub, hammam and sauna.

This campsite is set on the river bank, located in the village of Castellane, within a 5-minute drive of the Verdon Gorge. Free WiFi is provided in public areas and the property has a table tennis table as well as a boules pitch.

A TV with cable channels and a private terrace feature in all the chalets and mobile homes, which have a simple décor with wooden furnishings. The en suite bathrooms are fitted with a shower. Located at the edge of the forest, all accommodation types offer mountain views.

Guests can enjoy a variety of relaxing massages onsite and upon request.

A microwave, fridge and hotplates are included in each kitchenette at Camping La Ferme de Castellane. There are barbecue facilities at the property.  The property has a heated swimming pool as well as unusual accommodation.

Additional services include a laundrette and there is a children’s playground. You can watch Canal+ channels in the TV room, which also has a library or play table football and board games.

The centre of Castellane is 2.3 km from the campsite and the city of Grasse is 65 km away. It is the starting point of the GR4 hiking path and there is a free, private parking available on site.

Unlimited coffee, tea and hot chocolate is served in the morning.

Located in the heart of Verdon National Park, Gabrielle hôtel is situated in the village of Aiguines. It overlooks Sainte Croix Lake, where you can go canoeing or rent pedal boats.

All rooms have an en-suite bathroom with a hairdryer, TV and electric blinds.

A continental breakfast is served every morning.

Gabrielle hôtel is surrounded by many hiking trails and guests can enjoy cycling, windsurfing or visit the vineyards of Provence.

Mazet Lavande enjoys a location in Saint-Martin-de-Brômes, just 30 km from Golf du Luberon and 46 km from Digne Golf Course. This property offers a pool with a view and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is situated 26 km from ITER / Cadarache.

The holiday home has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saint-Martin-de-Brômes, like skiing and cycling.

Marseille Provence Airport is 97 km from the property.

hotel_name: Le Petit Grillo - Gite proche des gorges du Verdon
description:
Le Petit Grillo - Gite proche des gorges du Verdon is set in Allemagne-en-Provence and offers a casino and a garden. The air-conditioned accommodation is 35 km from Golf du Luberon, and guests can benefit from on-site private parking and complimentary WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 45 km from Digne Golf Course.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. This apartment also provides guests with a patio that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. The apartment offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

A coffee shop can be found on-site, and in the warmer months you can make use of the barbecue facilities.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Allemagne-en-Provence, like bike tours. Snorkelling, hiking and walking tours are possible within the area, and a water park is available on-site.

Marseille Provence Airport is 102 km away.

Located in Verdon Regional Park, Les Canyons du Verdon features an outdoor swimming pool with sunbeds, a garden and pétanque facilities. Castillon Lake is just 4.5 km away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Decorated in fresh colours, all rooms feature a private entrance, while some include a balcony, pool views or garden view and a TV. They are complete with an en suite bathroom.

A breakfast buffet is offered at the hotel. Castellane village is conveniently located 250 metres away, allowing easy access to restaurants, bars and shops.

A conference room is available on request. It can accommodate up to 20 people.

Notre-Dame du Roc Chapel is only a 15-minute walk away and Saint-André-les-Alpes is a 20-minute drive from the hotel. Free Wi-Fi access is available in reception and free private parking is possible on site. Free storage for motorbikes is available on site.

hotel_name: La Bastide du Calalou; BW Signature Collection
description:
Bastide Du Calalou is located a 30-minute drive from the Gorges du Verdon and a 20-minute drive from the Sainte-Croix Lake. It features a heated, outdoor swimming pool, a tennis court and elegant guestrooms that overlook the Aups Valley.

Rooms at Bastide Du Calalou are equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have a DVD and video player.

A full breakfast buffet is served daily and Bastide’s restaurant serves regional cuisine, prepared with local produce. Guests can enjoy lunch and dinner in the restaurant or on the terrace.

Bastide Du Calalou is close to the village of Tourtour and the black truffle market, which is the third largest in France and open from December to April.

Located 1 km from Moustiers-Sainte-Marie village centre, Le Colombier is just 5 km from Sainte-Croix Lake. This Provencal house features a swim spa, 2 hot tubs and tennis court. Free WiFi is provided.

Le Colombier offers air-conditioned rooms with panoramic views of the valley or Moustiers rocks. Decorated with Provencal-style furniture, they each have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The Colombier provides free private parking and a garage for cars, bicycles and motorcycles. Local leisure activities nearby include rafting, paragliding and canyoning.

Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a private pool, pool view and a terrace, L'Establoun is located in Saint-Martin-de-Brômes. Private parking is available on site at this recently renovated property. The accommodation features full-day security, and luggage storage for guests.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a satellite flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saint-Martin-de-Brômes, like hiking and walking tours. The apartment has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

ITER / Cadarache is 24 km from L'Establoun, while Golf du Luberon is 28 km away. Marseille Provence Airport is 96 km from the property.

The Lou Paradou hotel is located in Greoux-les-Bains, by the Verdon River, next to the lavender fields in the heart of the Provence. It is set within a large park and offers a heated, seasonal and heated outdoor pool.

The Lou Paradou offers air-conditioned studios equipped with a kitchenette, free Wi-Fi access in the rooms and a private balcony or terrace. Some studios have a view of the park and all have air condtioning.

A continental buffet breakfast is served everyday from 7h to 10h. The hotel is just 400 metres from Greoux village pedestrian centre and there is free on-site parking.

Guests can visit the Verdon Gorge, the largest canyon in Europe, the Luberon villages and Haute-Provence hilltop villages. Local leisure activities around Gréoux include hiking, mountain-bike, white-water sports, gliding and rock climbing.

Marseille Provence Airport is situated 80 km from the Hotel and Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station is 70 km away.

hotel_name: Les Bastides de Chanteraine Hôtel de plein air, bungalows, lodges & spa
description:
Set in Aiguines, Les Bastides de Chanteraine Hôtel de plein air, bungalows, lodges & spa offers accommodation with seating area. This property offers access to a terrace, table tennis, free private parking and free WiFi. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

Featuring views of the mountain, all units in the property come with private entrance and a heated pool. The units come with a coffee machine, while selected rooms here will provide you with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. The units feature bed linen.

À la carte and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries and juice are available. A family-friendly restaurant, coffee shop and bar can be found on-site.

The campground boasts a variety of wellness options, including spa facilities, wellness packages and yoga classes. Guests at the campground can enjoy darts on-site, or walking tours in the surroundings.

Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 113 km away.

Set in Castellane and only 17 km from Château de Taulane Golf Course, Camping Les Framboiseilles offers accommodation with mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property features garden views. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground.

Certain units in the campground have private entrance and are equipped with wardrobe and outdoor furniture. Some of the units feature a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer.

You can play table tennis at this 3-star campground, and the area is popular for hiking and walking tours. The campground has a picnic area and a terrace.

Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 82 km away.

Located in the heart of an olive grove, 800m from the village of Moustiers, La Clorinde is ideally situated to discover the Gorges du Verdon (1.5Km) and to appreciate the beauty of the lake of Sainte Croix (3Km) and the lavender fields.

The large, bright, quiet, air-conditioned rooms have a view on the garden and the mountains.

Breakfast (3 formulas), dinner, prepared with local products, will be served on the terrace and will make you appreciate the charms of the Provencal gastronomy.

We propose you, free of charge, a parking and a very powerful Wifi access. A laundry service is also available.

We speak 3 languages: French, English, Spanish

All your requests are welcome. La Clorinde, a haven of peace, will do everything possible to make your stay in Provence an unforgettable experience.

Located within 44 km of Château de Taulane Golf Course in La Palud sur Verdon, Les cabanes de Bourras features accommodation with seating area. There is a private entrance at the campground for the convenience of those who stay. The campground provides rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi.

All units come with a terrace with mountain views, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a toaster, and a private bathroom with shower. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the campground, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the campground will be able to enjoy activities in and around La Palud sur Verdon, like cycling.

Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 108 km away.

Situated in Baudinard and with ITER / Cadarache reachable within 44 km, Auberge de Baudinard sur Verdon features a terrace, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi and a restaurant.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Auberge de Baudinard sur Verdon, rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 110 km from the property.

Situated in an 18th-century building, Le Vieux Château features rooms with free Wi-Fi, a bar and a terrace. Set in the centre of Aiguines, it opens on a Provençal-style square with bars and shops.

With views of the village, all of the rooms are located on the 2nd floor and include a private bathroom with hairdryer, shower and free toiletries.

A French breakfast is served every morning. You can also enjoy an ice cream at the bar or try one of the Provençal specialties proposed at the hotel’s restaurant which is closed every Thursday evening and Friday all day.

You can go sailing on the Sainte Croix Lake, which is 8 km away, or visit the Museum of Prehistory in Quinson, a 40-minute drive away. Le Vieux Château is accessible via the A51 motorway.

Offering a sun terrace and views of the mountain, Auberge Verdon is a B&B situated in La Palud in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Region, 90 km from Fréjus, at the beginning of the Route des Crètes. Free private parking is available on site.

Rooms have a private bathroom equipped with a shower.

There is a shared lounge at the property.

Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. Grasse is 89 km from AUBERGE VERDON, while Gréoux-les-Bains is 58 km away. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 110 km from the property.

Located 1 km from Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, this hotel has a large collection of objects from the 1950's and paintings by Maurice Vagh-Weinmann. It also offers a seasonal outdoor pool and a furnished terrace.

Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room is individually decorated and has free Wi-Fi access, a TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony and views over the valley or the garden.

A continental breakfast is served daily. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or on 1 of the 2 terraces with views of the garden.

Activities in the nearby area include cycling, hiking and paragliding. Nautical activities and fishing is possible by Lac de Sainte-Croix, 5 km from the hotel. Les Gorges du Verdon is also 5 km away.

The 4-star Central Park Hôtel & Spa is situated a 10-minute walk from the heart of La Rochelle, within walking distance from the beach, and next to the Old Harbour. Guests can enjoy the wellness centre featuring a gym, hot tubs, sauna, hammam, massages, and beauty treatments at an extra cost.

At this modern, yet eco-friendly hotel, all rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries. The suites feature a seating area where you can relax, and some suites have a terrace with a hot tub. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available in each bedroom.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is served. It includes local and organic products. Set in a residential area, the hotel is also a few steps from shops and restaurants.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge at the property.

Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 1.7 km from Central Park Hôtel & Spa, while La Rochelle Grosse Horloge is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 3 km from the property.

hotel_name: La Belle Amarre-Bed and Breakfast-Maison d'Hôtes
description:
La Belle Amarre-Bed and Breakfast-Maison d'Hôtes provides accommodation located 400 metres from the centre of La Rochelle and offers a terrace and a bar. With city views, this accommodation features a patio. The guest house features family rooms.

The units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, bathrobes and a desk. Guests can have wine or champagne, fruits and chocolates or cookies delivered to their room. All units include a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available. There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Concurrence Beach, La Rochelle Train Station and L'Espace Encan. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 4 km away.

Well set in a central area of La Rochelle, La Rochelle en famille - 5 personnes offers garden views and a private beach area. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The accommodation provides a lift and private check-in and check-out for guests.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and lake views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around La Rochelle, like walking tours. If you would like to discover the area, cycling, fishing and hiking are possible in the surroundings and La Rochelle en famille - 5 personnes can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Concurrence Beach, La Rochelle Train Station and L'Espace Encan. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 7 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Set in the La Rochelle City Centre district in La Rochelle, Appartements Les Rochelais offers 3-star rooms with free WiFi. The property features inner courtyard views and is 2.9 km from Plage Du Roux and 1.1 km from La Rochelle Train Station. The property is 700 metres from Concurrence Beach, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

Each unit is fitted with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include L'Espace Encan, Parc Expo de La Rochelle and La Rochelle Grosse Horloge. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 5 km away.

Ideally set in the historic La Rochelle, this 17th-century building overlooks the old harbour. Hôtel De La Monnaie is decorated by artworks and features a terrace and a wellness centre. The parking on site is limited and available upon request.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hôtel De La Monnaie offer views of the indoor courtyard or the old city encircled with fortifications. Each has a TV and free WiFi, tea/coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom.

Wellness centre is only available upon request.

Guests can have a drink at the bar and enjoy breakfast in the quaint living room, the sunny courtyard or in the privacy of their room.

The central location of the De La Monnaie hotel allows guests to stroll in the pedestrian streets and discover the many local restaurants, and the nearby market selling regional products. Private parking is available at an additional cost for guests arriving by car.

Offering a garden and quiet street view, La villa voyage is situated in La Rochelle, 5 km from La Rochelle Train Station and 6 km from L'Espace Encan. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are accessible at the holiday home free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.1 km from Concurrence Beach.

The 2-bedroom holiday home has a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

A water park is available on-site and fishing can be enjoyed within close proximity of La villa voyage.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Charruyer Park, Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle de La Rochelle and Jardin des Plantes. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 2 km from the property.

Located in La Rochelle, beside Port des Minimes, this residence offers a covered, heated pool and a well being centre. It is a 5-minute walk from the Aquarium and the Vieux Port. On-site parking is available, at a surcharge, based on availability.

Each soundproofed apartment and studio at the Lagrange Appart'Hotel l’Escale Marine has a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave grill oven, a private bathroom and free WiFi. All apartment and suites are accessible by a lift.

Massages treatments are available at a surcharge and upon request. It is 1 km from La Rochelle Ville Train station, and 8 km from the La Rochelle- île de Ré Airport.

Located in La Rochelle, this Pierre & Vacances residence is a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbour and 300 metres from the TGV Train Station. It has a heated indoor swimming pool and a terrace.

The Pierre & Vacances Centre offers studio apartments with a lounge area and a flat-screen TV. Each studio has a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, microwave and an electric coffee-maker.

The residence is serviced by a lift and facilities are available for guests with reduced mobility.

The Residence Pierre & Vacances Centre is an ideal base for discovering La Rochelle and guests can enjoy a boat trip to the Île de Ré and Fort Boyard. The beach is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Subject to availability, paid parking is available upon reservation and for an extra charge.

Please note that the swimming pool is open from 09:00 until 19:00 daily.

hotel_name: Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port
description:
Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is located in La Rochelle on the harbour. It offers free WiFi throughout the entire hotel.

Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is close to many restaurants and is a short walk to the historic district, the beach and the attractions of La Rochelle. From here it is easy to access the island of Ré and Oléron.

It offers comfortable rooms with air-conditioning, en suite facilities and flat-screen TV with Canal+ and Eurosport.

Breakfast is be served from 07:00 to 11:00 on Saturday and Sunday and from 06:00 until 10:30 from Monday to Friday.

Please note that when booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply .

hotel_name: Séjours & Affaires La Rochelle Les Minimes
description:
The Séjours & Affaires Les Minimes is located in La Rochelle, just a few steps from the harbour and only a 15-minute walk from the train station and the marina. It offers self-catering apartments and studios for minimum stays of 4 nights.

Each soundproofed apartment at the Séjours & Affaires La Rochelle Les Minimes is fully furnished and offers carpet and parquet floors, fully equipped kitchenette and private bathroom.

Beds are made before arrival and a house cleaning service is provided once a week for free. For guests coming by car, private parking is available.

The La Rochelle SNCF Train Station and Les Minimes are both just a 15-minute walk from the residence.

Situated in the lively Saint Nicolas district in La Rochelle, this hotel is surrounded by antique dealers, bars and cafés. It offers free Wi-Fi and a conservatory with large sofas and tropical plants.

The air-conditioned guest rooms each have a flat-screen TV with canal+ and satellite channels. Private bathrooms are equipped with a shower or a bathroom and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast featuring hot and fresh items is served daily in the conservatory. A continental breakfast can also be delivered directly to guests’ rooms. Local drinks, tea and coffee can be enjoyed in the bar.

Limited private secured parking can be booked at an extra cost, upon availability. The maximum height is 1m90 and the width of the parking spaces is about 2m.

Saint Nicolas Tower that guards the entrance to the old port is 550 metres from the hotel. La Rochelle Train Station is 700 metres away.

Résidence New Rochelle is located near the marina in La Rochelle. It has an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. The beach is just 200 metres away.

Each of the Résidence’s studios has a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and a microwave, and free WiFi access. Some studios have views over the marina or the swimming pool, subject to availability.

The property provides an outdoor terrace. Guests of the Résidence New Rochelle can find restaurants nearby open for lunch and dinner.

A Secure and free Bicycle parking is available within our property.

The centre of La Rochelle can be accessed in 10 minutes by bus. Private parking is available nearby and guests can access the N11 highway in 10 minutes by car.

hotel_name: Villa Babeth by Nuits au Port
description:
Offering a garden and quiet street view, Villa Babeth by Nuits au Port is set in La Rochelle, less than 1 km from Minimes and a 15-minute walk from Plage Du Roux. This beachfront property offers access to a patio, free private parking and free WiFi. La Rochelle Train Station is 2.4 km from the villa and Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 3 km away.

The villa comes with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with sea views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the villa include L'Espace Encan, The Minimes Marina and Musée Maritime de La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 9 km away.

Located in La Rochelle, 2.5 km from Concurrence Beach, Les studios du chemins vert provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. It is situated 1.8 km from La Rochelle Train Station and features a concierge service. The aparthotel features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a terrace offering garden views, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchenette and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available.

Guests can keep up their exercise routines during yoga and fitness classes. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the aparthotel, while cycling and walking tours can be enjoyed nearby.

Popular points of interest near Les studios du chemins vert include Parc Expo de La Rochelle, La Rochelle Grosse Horloge and Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle de La Rochelle. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 5 km away.

Le Champlain is located opposite Parc Charruyer in the heart of La Rochelle. It offers spacious air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TV and free WiFi.

Guestrooms at the Hotel Champlain are all serviced by a lift.

The hotel provides an express check in service and a 24-hour reception. Guests can relax in the gardens or in the hotel bar with a selection of international newspapers.

Hotel Champlain is just 5 minutes from the Old Port.

This Appart'city is a 10-minute walk from La Rochelle Train Station and 15 minutes from the Old Port and the Old Town. It offers contemporary accommodation with a seating area and an LCD TV.

The apartments and studios at Appart'City Classic La Rochelle Centre have free WiFi internet access. Some offer a private balcony and all feature a kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge.

A buffet breakfast is served at the residence and is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided. Guests can also buy drinks and snacks at the reception.

Outdoor and underground parking is possible at Appart’city and La Rochelle Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Guests may also choose to visit Ile de Ré, which is just 15 km away.

Offering a garden and garden view, Appartement Marine - Park Avenue- Wifi-Jardin-Pkg is set in La Rochelle, 5.4 km from La Rochelle Train Station and 6 km from L'Espace Encan. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Concurrence Beach.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower. This apartment also provides guests with a terrace that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. At the apartment, there is a dressing room for guests to change in.

Guests at Appartement Marine - Park Avenue- Wifi-Jardin-Pkg will be able to enjoy activities in and around La Rochelle, like walking tours.

Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 6 km from the accommodation, while La Rochelle Grosse Horloge is 3.3 km away. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 2 km from the property.

Located in the heart of the city and footsteps from the old port of La Rochelle, the hotel welcomes you in a genuine 18th century ship owner’s residence.

Set between the Market Place and Verdun Square, Hotel De La Paix features 19 comfortable rooms for one to 5 people, and a warm and friendly welcome whether you are on a business trip or a family holiday. 

The hotel also offers new services like hiring of meeting rooms and Wi-Fi access in all the rooms, and the chef’s cuisine is at once creative and traditional.

Situated in the centre of La Rochelle, just 800 metres from Concurrence Beach and 3 km from Plage Du Roux, The Clock House, 3 étoiles features accommodation with inner courtyard views and free WiFi. The property has quiet street views and is 1.3 km from L'Espace Encan and 1.5 km from Parc Expo de La Rochelle. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.2 km from La Rochelle Train Station.

Boasting a DVD player, the apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room, a dining area, 2 bedrooms, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, Tour de la Chaine and La Rochelle Cathedral. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 4 km from the property.

hotel_name: Le Masq Hôtel Best Western Premier
description:
The Best Western Masqhotel is a design hotel located a 5-minute walk from La Rochelle’s Vieux Port. It offers contemporary rooms, a lounge bar and free WiFi.

Rooms and suites at the Masqhotel are air-conditioned and feature original artwork. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and tea and coffee making facilities.

A buffet breakfast with hot and cold dishes is served each morning at the hotel. Guests are also invited to relax in the hotel’s lounge bar, which offers a large selection of drinks and free newspapers.

The hotel’s reception desk is open 24 hours a day. A laundry service and private parking are available at an additional cost.

An Eco-Label awarded hotel, Best Western Masqhotel is located 150 metres from La Rochelle Train Station and 6 km from La Rochelle Airport.

Located in the heart of historic La Rochelle, this hotel is set in a 16th century building just a 5 minute walk from the Old Port and local market. Hôtel François 1er offers free unlimited WiFi and a 24-hour reception.

All room at Hôtel François 1er are spacious, and feature a design and cosy décor inspired by the themes of rock, movie, painting, graffiti or photography. They are fitted with a TV, and come with a private bathroom.

Various facilities are available at the property such as the room service, a bar lounge, and a chill out area. Upon prior request and at an extra cost, guests can park their car in the property's secure parking located in the city centre.

The hotel is within walking distance from several shops, restaurants and lively bars. Hôtel François 1er is also close to attractions such as the Aquarium, the Natural History Museum, the city's parks and beaches.

La Rochelle Train Station is conveniently located 1.9 km from Hôtel François 1er.

Built in 1646, Hotel de L’Ocean is located on the Old Port, in the heart of La Rochelle. It offers soundproofed rooms equipped with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

Some rooms offer a view of the Bay of Biscay and the harbour.

A continental breakfast can be served on the outside terrace, in the breakfast room or in the room.

Hotel de L’Ocean is a 2-minute walk from La Rochelle’s main tourist attractions and La Rochelle Aquarium is a 15-minute walk away. Boat shuttles to Ile d'Aix, Fort Boyard, and Ré and Oléron islands are available in front of the hotel.

Located in the heart of La Rochelle, just a 10-minute walk from the train station and right next to the harbour, Hôtel Le Rupella offers en-suite rooms with free WiFi access and a desk.

All rooms at Hôtel Le Rupella also have a flat-screen TV as well as a private bathroom fitted with a bathtub or a shower and free toiletries. Some rooms feature a balcony.

Offering panoramic views over the harbour, the hotel’s restaurant serves traditional French cuisine. Guests can also sip a drink at the on-site bar and enjoy their breakfast in their room.

The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and is located 850 metres from the city’s Aquarium and a 5-minute drive from La Rochelle Parc Expo.

Situated in La Rochelle, 1.1 km from Plage Du Roux, ATHOME RESIDENCE ET SPA features accommodation with spa facilities and a fitness room. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The aparthotel has family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining table, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and pancakes are available. There is a coffee shop, bar and lounge.

The aparthotel features a garden and sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near ATHOME RESIDENCE ET SPA include Minimes, L'Espace Encan and La Rochelle Train Station. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 8 km from the property.

Résidence Odalys Archipel is set in La Rochelle, just 1.4 km from the beaches, the port and the city centre. It offers fully furnished, ready-to-live-in apartments, an outdoor heated swimming pool, a fitness room and fiber-supported internet access. The property is fully air conditioned.

All of the apartments have a private bathroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchenette, LCD TV and free internet access. Some have a terrace or balcony, subject to availability.

Laundry and a ticketing service are available at Résidence Odalys Archipel. Daily housekeeping is possible at an extra cost.

La Rochelle features numerous sites and attractions such as the old port and the marina, the old city and numerous art festivals.
